class_notes:
Prerequisite: Enrolled in Extern fieldwork credits.
ONLY STUDENTS APPROVED BY PROFESSOR HOWARD MAY ENROLL IN THIS COURSE.
course_description: Students are supported in their placements by a weekly class meeting with other students in similar placements, taught by faculty with practice experience in that area, in which students have the opportunity to learn legal and professional skills they need to succeed in the externship, receive mentoring independent of their on-site supervisors, and to step back and reflect on their experience and what they are learning from it.
sections: Class Nbr: 5527, Section #: 000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-7p, Instructor: R. Rocker McMullin, Status: Open
